#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int input()
{
	int t=0; char c;
	c=getchar_unlocked();
	while(c<'0' || c>'9')
		c=getchar_unlocked();
	while(c>='0' && c<='9')
	{t=(t<<3)+(t<<1)+c-'0'; c=getchar_unlocked();}
	return t;
}


int main()
{
	int test_cases;
	test_cases=input();
	while(test_cases--)
	{
		int number;
		number=input();
		if(number%2!=0 && number%3!=0)
			printf("NO\n");
		else
			printf("YES\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
